name: 7BeatsFromHeaven
description:
[GAME NOT FINISHED]

Hello Everyone !

Let me tell you a quick story around the project. I (William Gauthier / Game Designer) always tried to find a creative way to propose my girlfriend and come up with the idea to create a game for her. 

However, I didn't have all the skills to do it alone and during the preparation of the ArteGameJam, I came accross with beautiful and talented people : Camille Seren (Game Artist), Rémy Kaddour (Game Artist), Axel Bardoni (Game/Level Designer), Dylan Dromard (Prog) and Alexandre Houngbo (Sound Designer).

With the enthousiasm of everyone and the theme of the Game Jam, it was the perfect match and time to do it ! 

It's a really personal project, yet a happy way to celebrate love and cuteness ! 

I hope you will enjoy it !
